turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Hey, I'm trying to figure out dinner tonight. Feeling lazy, so delivery is a must. Any recommendations for something good near me?

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Absolutely! To give you the best recommendations, could you share your general location or zip code? And are you in the mood for anything specific like Italian, Asian, or comfort food?

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Okay, my zip is 90210. I'm kinda tired of the usual pizza/burgers. I was thinking something a bit more interesting, maybe some good Thai or Vietnamese? And honestly, I'm worried about delivery time - had a terrible experience last week. How can I know which places are faster?

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Got it, 90210 and looking for Thai or Vietnamese. Let me pull up some options... For Thai, 'Spicy Basil' is popular, and for Vietnamese, 'Pho King Good' gets great reviews. Regarding delivery times, estimated times are shown on the restaurant's page before you order.
